languages.text: "Держите, Ваша Светлость". {n}Женщина протягивает увесистую печать со срезанным гербом на рукоятке.{/n} "Не знаю, это ли вы ищете, но у нас ее обменял какой-то подозрительный тип много лет назад. Отец сразу подумал, что это что-то значимое, да только так она и валялась по сей день. Даром отдаю, нам она все равно ни к чему".

traits.locale_text: "Держите, Ваша Светлость". {n}Женщина протягивает увесистую печать со срезанным гербом на рукоятке.{/n} "Не знаю, это ли вы ищете, но у нас ее обменял какой-то подозрительный тип много лет назад. Отец сразу подумал, что это что-то значимое, да только так она и валялась по сей день. Даром отдаю, нам она все равно ни к чему".
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."
languages.original_text: "Держите, Ваша Светлость". {n}Женщина протягивает увесистую печать со срезанным гербом на рукоятке.{/n} "Не знаю, это ли вы ищете, но у нас ее обменял какой-то подозрительный тип много лет назад. Отец сразу подумал, что это что-то значимое, да только так она и валялась по сей день. Даром отдаю, нам она все равно ни к чему".

traits.locale_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty stamp with a crest carved into the handle.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty stamp with a crest carved into the handle.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “收下这个吧，大人。”{n}蕾塔拿出了一枚沉重的印章，手柄上纹章的位置已经被划坏了。{/n}“我不知道这是不是您要找的东西。几年前，我们和一群形迹可疑的家伙做了笔交易，拿到了这个东西。我父亲认为它很重要，于是它一直被保存起来，直到今天才重见天日。就把这当做送给您的礼物吧，反正它对我们来说也没什么用。”
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: “收下这个吧，大人。”{n}蕾塔拿出了一枚沉重的印章，手柄上纹章的位置已经被划坏了。{/n}“我不知道这是不是您要找的东西。几年前，我们和一群形迹可疑的家伙做了笔交易，拿到了这个东西。我父亲认为它很重要，于是它一直被保存起来，直到今天才重见天日。就把这当做送给您的礼物吧，反正它对我们来说也没什么用。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Aquí tiene, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Reta te extiende un pesado sello. Donde debería encontrarse el blasón en el mango solo hay arañazos.{/n} «No sé si esto es lo que busca, pero lo conseguimos en un intercambio con un hombre bastante sospechoso hace años. Mi padre creía que era importante, así que lleva desde entonces cogiendo polvo. Considérelo un regalo; a nosotros no nos sirve de nada».
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí tiene, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Reta te extiende un pesado sello. Donde debería encontrarse el blasón en el mango solo hay arañazos.{/n} «No sé si esto es lo que busca, pero lo conseguimos en un intercambio con un hombre bastante sospechoso hace años. Mi padre creía que era importante, así que lleva desde entonces cogiendo polvo. Considérelo un regalo; a nosotros no nos sirve de nada».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「どうぞ、陛下」{n}レタは重い印章を差し出す。ハンドルには、紋章があるべき箇所には傷がある。{/n}「これがあなたが探しているものなのかどうかは知りませんが、何年も前に怪しい奴との取引でこれを手に入れたんです。父はそれが重要なものだと思っていたので、今日まで埃をかぶっていただけです。私たちからの贈り物としてお受け取りください。いずれにせよ、私たちには使い道がありませんから」
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: 「どうぞ、陛下」{n}レタは重い印章を差し出す。ハンドルには、紋章があるべき箇所には傷がある。{/n}「これがあなたが探しているものなのかどうかは知りませんが、何年も前に怪しい奴との取引でこれを手に入れたんです。父はそれが重要なものだと思っていたので、今日まで埃をかぶっていただけです。私たちからの贈り物としてお受け取りください。いずれにせよ、私たちには使い道がありませんから」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Hier, bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Reta hält dir ein schweres Siegel entgegen. Auf dem Griff, wo sich das Wappen befinden sollte, sind Kratzer.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, ob das dem entspricht, was Ihr sucht, aber wir haben das Ding vor Jahren bei einem zwielichtigen Kerl eingetauscht. Mein Vater hielt es für wichtig, und so hat es bis heute Staub angesammelt. Nehmt es als Geschenk – wir haben ohnehin keine Verwendung dafür."
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: "Hier, bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Reta hält dir ein schweres Siegel entgegen. Auf dem Griff, wo sich das Wappen befinden sollte, sind Kratzer.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, ob das dem entspricht, was Ihr sucht, aber wir haben das Ding vor Jahren bei einem zwielichtigen Kerl eingetauscht. Mein Vater hielt es für wichtig, und so hat es bis heute Staub angesammelt. Nehmt es als Geschenk – wir haben ohnehin keine Verwendung dafür."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Tenez, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Réta vous tend un sceau massif. Le manche présente des marques à l'endroit où devrait se trouver un blason.{/n} « Je sais pas si c'est ce que vous cherchez, mais un type bizarre nous a refilé ça lors d'un échange il y a quelques années. Mon père l'a gardé parce qu'il pensait que c'était quelque chose d'important. Prenez-le, je vous l'offre. Il ne nous sert à rien, de toute façon. »
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."

traits.locale_text: « Tenez, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Réta vous tend un sceau massif. Le manche présente des marques à l'endroit où devrait se trouver un blason.{/n} « Je sais pas si c'est ce que vous cherchez, mais un type bizarre nous a refilé ça lors d'un échange il y a quelques années. Mon père l'a gardé parce qu'il pensait que c'était quelque chose d'important. Prenez-le, je vous l'offre. Il ne nous sert à rien, de toute façon. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Buyurun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Reta, ağır bir mühür uzatıyor. Mührün sapında, arma olması gereken yerde çizikler var.{/n} "Aradığınız şey bu mu bilmiyorum ama birkaç yıl önce şu zımbırtıyı kanunsuz herifin tekinden almıştık. Babam bunu önemli bir şey diye bellemişti. O yüzden o günden beri de bir köşede duruyordu. Bizden size armağan olsun... Zaten bizim bir işimize yaramıyor."
languages.original_text: "Here you go, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Reta holds out a weighty seal. There are scratches on the handle where a coat of arms should be.{/n} "I don't know if this is what you're looking for, but we got this thing in a trade with some shady bloke years back. My father thought it was something important, so it's just been gathering dust until today. Take it as a gift — we have no use for it anyway."
